headline: Corning (NYSE:GLW) Announces US$0.28 Quarterly Dividend Payment
summary: Corning (NYSE:GLW) has reaffirmed its commitment to shareholders by declaring a quarterly dividend of $0.28 per share, set for payment on September 29, 2025. This announcement aligns with the company’s 10% share price increase over the last quarter. The rise can be viewed in the context of broader market trends, where an overall 12% market uptick in the past year frames Corning's performance.
